---
title: "Temps de défaillance gamma"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
nombre_de_courbes = 5
t = seq(0,40,length.out = 80) #l'intervalle de temps
#les paramètres du modèle
a=1
b=5 
c=1.3
w = 200 # le seuil
dt = dt <- t[-1]^c - t[-length(t)]^c 
dX = rgamma(n = length(dt),shape = a * dt,scale = b) #les accroissements
X = c(0,cumsum(dX)) #le processus
plot(t,X,"l")
for (i in (2:nombre_de_courbes)){
  dx = rgamma(n = length(dt),shape = a * dt,scale = b)
  x = c(0,cumsum(dx))
  lines(t,x)
  
}
abline(a=w,b=0,col="red")
```

```{r}
nb_trajectoires = 50000
failure_time = numeric(nb_trajectoires)
for (i in (1:nb_trajectoires)){
  dx = rgamma(n = length(dt),shape = a * dt,scale = b)
  x = c(0,cumsum(dx))
  failure_time[i]= t[x>w][1]
}
hist(failure_time,probability = TRUE)
```
